LanguageData.YayoAnim_OnlyPlayerPawnsTooltip: Prevents any pawn (be it human, animal, or mechanoid) from having any animations unless they're from player's faction.
LanguageData.YayoAnim_MaximumZoomLevelTooltip: Determines maximum zoom level at which the animations will play. If you zoom beyond it, the animations will stop playing.
LanguageData.YayoAnim_TwirlWeaponMaxMassEnabled: Disable weapon twirling for weapons over specific mass
LanguageData.YayoAnim_TwirlWeaponMaxSizeEnabled: Disable weapon twirling for weapons over specific size
LanguageData.YayoAnim_RequiresWalkTooltip: Requires walking animations to be enabled as well
LanguageData.YayoAnim_RequiresJobTooltip: Requires all work animations to be anbled as well
LanguageData.YayoAnim_RequiresCombatTooltip: Requires combat animations to be enabled as well
LanguageData.YayoAnim_ApplyHarPatchTooltip: This should generally be kept on as it fixes issues with HAR enabled - disable only if this causes issues or negatively impacts performance
LanguageData.YayoAnim_ApplyOversizedChanges: Apply drawing changes from Oversized Weapons
LanguageData.YayoAnim_ApplyOversizedChangesTooltip: Oversized Weapons (from CopmOversizedWeapons) can have additional data for things like weapon rotation, position offset, and others. Disabling this option disables those from being applied (with exception of dual-wield and projectile deflection). This does NOT affect Enable Oversized Weapons mod.
